video.title: Locked Up
video.synopsis: Manipulated into embezzling funds for her boyfriend and sentenced to prison, a naïve young woman must quickly learn to survive in a harsh new world.

episodes.synopsis: Macarena’s life is shattered when she’s sentenced to seven years in prison for fiscal crimes, a fact she struggles to hide from her parents.
episodes.title: Dead Mosquito

episodes.synopsis: Sole suffers a health crisis, and Macarena scrambles to find a way to warn her parents that they're in imminent danger.
episodes.title: Sewing Tinkerbell

episodes.synopsis: Macarena races against a deadline to pay back her growing debt to Anabel. The SIM card goes missing and changes hands multiple times.
episodes.title: Everything Happens for a Reason

episodes.synopsis: When Zulema and Anabel harass Valbuena, he pits the two against each other. Rizos gets an offer she can't refuse, even if it means betraying Macarena.
episodes.title: A Day in the Country

episodes.synopsis: As the scene in the woods plays out in flashbacks, Rizos learns she must get a job on the outside, and Zulema reveals a secret to Saray's family.
episodes.title: Harsh Reality

episodes.synopsis: Anabel forces Macarena to pick up more drugs for her via a conjugal visit with a stranger. Leopoldo and Román track down the Egyptian's camper van.
episodes.title: They’ll Come for You

episodes.synopsis: Maca comes to realize she has proof of her relationship with Simón: their unborn son. But getting the fetus's DNA tested will be no easy task.
episodes.title: 5 on the Dot

episodes.synopsis: Macarena's feelings of attraction to Rizos overwhelm her -- and confuse her. Leopoldo suffers a serious setback. Zulema attempts to escape.
episodes.title: Pretty Woman

episodes.synopsis: Zulema and Saray hold Macarena hostage in order to force the release of the Egyptian, but Leopoldo wants Hanbal to reveal where the money is first.
episodes.title: Quid pro quo

episodes.synopsis: Macarena agrees to be Rizos's girlfriend. Sandoval tries to convince Miranda to send Macarena, who's having visions of a cat, to a psychiatric prison.
episodes.title: Gray Cat

episodes.synopsis: A donor heart becomes available for Sole. Zulema offers Leopoldo the Egyptian in exchange for 8 million euros. Macarena makes an untimely discovery.
episodes.title: The Turtle Principle

episodes.synopsis: An accident scares Macarena into fleeing overseas with the other escapees. Fabio makes a decision about his marriage. Miranda picks a security chief.
episodes.title: Two Guns for One Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Sandoval's wife gets a shock. Karim forces Zulema's lawyer to give him a lead on the Egyptian. Castillo's search of the Ferreiro home turns harrowing.
episodes.title: Home Sweet Home

episodes.synopsis: Castillo turns against Leopoldo and breaks his promises to help Macarena. The police are assigned a new case involving a missing teen girl.
episodes.title: The Little Hen

episodes.synopsis: Macarena goes to great lengths to email Karim. Sole tracks down the family of the heart donor. Saray and Macarena learn what Valbuena did to Rizos.
episodes.title: A Body in the Trunk

episodes.synopsis: Under the guise of a conjugal visit, Zulema shares a secret plan with Román that will benefit them both. In solitary, Saray falls prey to Sandoval.
episodes.title: In the line of fire I

episodes.synopsis: An undercover cop from Fabio's past and a suspect in the case of the missing teen enter the prison. Encarna brings the Egyptian's ashes to his mother.
episodes.title: The Baboons

episodes.synopsis: An outbreak of food poisoning prompts the inmates to launch a defiant protest. Macarena is granted a 24-hour leave, which takes a startling turn.
episodes.title: A Field Day

episodes.synopsis: Susana tells Helena she had a daughter. Sandoval shares a suspicion with Miranda about her husband. Fernando surprises Sole with a request.
episodes.title: Life Goes On

episodes.synopsis: Zulema contrives to destroy Susana's loyalty to her husband. Sole and Fernando have their conjugal visit. In Morocco, Román searches for the money.
episodes.title: Getting Your Fingers Burned

episodes.synopsis: Rizos proposes a sexy fundraiser for Macarena's legal defense. Palacios makes a confession to Fabio. Zulema goes to extremes to get out of solitary.
episodes.title: Sins and Confusions

episodes.synopsis: Amaia's parents ask to see Zulema. When Rizos is jumped for taking over the drug trade, Macarena searches for a way to strip Anabel of her power.
episodes.title: Patron of the Desperate

episodes.synopsis: Sole is scared off by the hope Fernando offers her. A judge hears Zulema's request for a deal. Fabio makes a change in plans that stuns Macarena.
episodes.title: Banana and Lemon

episodes.synopsis: Sole's big day arrives. Sandoval receives an offer. As time runs out, Macarena ruthlessly tries to force Zulema to reveal Amaia's location.
episodes.title: Liquid

episodes.synopsis: Due to overcrowding, Macarena and her friends -- and enemies -- are transferred to a new prison. Sole gets news about her husband that interests Anabel.
episodes.title: North Cross

episodes.synopsis: The Chinese gang gives Mercedes a mission. Fabio pays Macarena a visit. Altagracia executes an illicit plan to find out who killed her colleague.
episodes.title: Very easy or very difficult

episodes.synopsis: Altagracia learns an upsetting truth about Unai. Saray receives shocking news from her mother.  The Chinese gang spots Anabel stealing their drug trade.
episodes.title: One grain of rice

episodes.synopsis: Zulema learns about the Chinese gang's escape plan and drug-smuggling method, and takes steps to hijack both. Sole seeks to avenge her husband's murder.
episodes.title: The flag on the wall

episodes.synopsis: Mercedes's daughter goes missing. Altagracia's investigation of the cash found in Unai's locker puts a target on her back. Tere again faces temptation.
episodes.title: Someone who doesn't give a shit about you

episodes.synopsis: A smuggling malfunction causes chaos in the henhouse. Mercedes learns who was actually behind her daughter's disappearance. Rojas shares her bad news.
episodes.title: Six months is a long time

episodes.synopsis: Per an Easter tradition, a Cruz del Norte inmate is selected to be pardoned. With Altagracia's help, Zulema negotiates a deal with Hong Fang.
episodes.title: We were girls

episodes.synopsis: Altagracia sets out to avenge Unai's murder. Zulema decides to fulfill her promise to Saray. Mercedes gets caught in a showdown between sibling rivals.
episodes.title: What we know about monsters

episodes.synopsis: A familiar face becomes Cruz del Norte's director, and an ex-jailer arrives as an inmate. Zulema does whatever it takes to avoid going back to prison.
episodes.title: The Barbie

episodes.synopsis: An inmate dares to swipe the drugs left in the middle of the floor. Altagracia uses her knowledge of the prison's inner workings to devise an escape.
episodes.title: The Escape

episodes.synopsis: When Zulema refuses to reveal Altagracia's location, all the inmates receive the same punishment she gets. Sole gives Tere a grave responsibility.
episodes.title: Threshold of Pain

episodes.synopsis: Goya immediately preys upon Fátima. Zulema and Altagracia try to force Sandoval's hand by targeting the person he cares about most: his ex-wife.
episodes.title: Mum

episodes.synopsis: An inmate says a difficult goodbye. The choir performs at a retirement home, where some of the singers use the opportunity to stock up on drugs.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Sad news leads Tere to a happy reunion. Sandoval finally succeeds in awakening Zulema's maternal instinct and uses it as a weapon against her.
episodes.title: Bad Person

episodes.synopsis: An inmate comes back from the brink of death. Sandoval sets out to complete his mission of revenge. Sole's exit strategy hits a snag.
episodes.title: Back Home

episodes.synopsis: Two old flames are reunited. Sole leaves on her own terms, while Zulema decides what Sandoval's ending will be. The inmates' fates are revealed.
episodes.title: The Yellow Tide

episodes.synopsis: After two years, Macarena wants out of the armed robbery business. But Zulema has one last heist in mind, and they'll need expert help to pull it off.
episodes.title: Like Married Couples who Have a Child before Separating

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding festivities get underway, the phony waitstaff work their way to the safe. A flashback recalls the day Zulema was released from prison.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Goya and Triana are tasked with getting rid of the hostage. The hotel owner reveals her intentions to her son. Macarena learns she's been tricked.
episodes.title: Like a Mother's Love

episodes.synopsis: Macarena confronts Ama with her discovery. Zulema is forced to show the cops where she hid the diamonds. Slim's husband comes to his wife's rescue.
episodes.title: Equal or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: A flashback reveals the source of Zulema's hallucinations. Teenager Vivi has a disturbing encounter. Slim runs into trouble at the hospital.
episodes.title: The Life of Mosquitoes

episodes.synopsis: Goya sees her 15-year-old self in bullied Lucas, who tries to escape his misery. Ramala sets out to find and kill Mónica. Vivi seeks help from Zulema.
episodes.title: I Hate Sentimentality

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback, Macarena and Zulema spend an eventful New Year's Eve together. To negotiate his daughter's release, Ramala holds Macarena hostage.
episodes.title: The Red Line

episodes.synopsis: Cepo reveals a secret that could save his crew from Ramala. Triana chooses love above all. Zulema decides if she must die, it'll be on her own terms.
episodes.title: Who was Zulema Zahir?
